homepage.title: XMLBS - XML body shop
homepage.description: XMLBS transforms data to XML parsable state. Useful for tidying, parsing or even transferring HTML to XHTML.

section.title: Features
section.para:
• unquoted tag attributes
  • stray illegal characters like < and >
  • close unclosed tags trying to obey structure rules
  • fix tag overlap like <i> foo <b> bar </i> boo </b>
Please see the TODO file for bugs and future enhancements.
